monsters.name: Giant Rat
monsters.description: A giant rat is a larger cousin of what can be found in the sewers of castles and dungeons. Despite being the size of a large dog, it is fairly weak and relatively easy to defeat.

monsters.name: Dragon
monsters.description: A dragon is a creature of legend. Ancient and powerful, it will fly in to devastate entire regions with its fire breath.

monsters.name: Minotaur
monsters.description: Half human, half beast, the minotaur is a powerful combatant that will cleft it's enemies in twain with its mighty great-axe.

monsters.name: Swarm of Flying Monkeys
monsters.description: While somewhat rare, flying monkeys can harass villages and towns across the area. Even though they are not very strong, they are still both agile and dangerous.

monsters.name: Horde of Goblin Raiders
monsters.description: A goblin raiding party can be devastating to a settlement, and should not be taken lightly despite an individual goblin's small size.

monsters.name: Ravenous Flying Squirrel
monsters.description: The size of a very very large squirrel, but with a ferocious carnivorous appetite and quick attacks.

monsters.name: Frost Giant
monsters.description: Standing at 18 feet tall, the frost giant is a fearsome creature that can freeze its enemies with its icy breath.

monsters.name: Vorpal Bunny
monsters.description: That rabbit is dynamite!  It is surrounded by the slain bones of many brave adventurers!
